Canopy awnings

Consist of a curved, segmented frame covered by the special fabric.
This type of solution allows both top and side sun protection, optimal for windows, balconies, residential and commercial entrances.
Their design makes them ideal for being customized with a business sign or advertising lettering.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle”
